These super easy Tacos come together within minutes. Use canned black beans, add Jamaican jerk spice blend and onions and cook for a few. Meanwhile roast some corn, shuck and make a bowl of salsa. Assemble, add some avocado and lime juice and serve.

I use spices ahd herbs to make up the Jamaican Blend. You can use premade jamaican jerk blend or other blends like cajun spice, chili blend etc. Toss in some chopped veggies or summer squash to cook with the beans. Add toppings of choice such as vegan sour cream, guacamole or other creamy dressing. Vegan Glutenfree Soyfree Nutfree Recipe.

recipeIngredient: 30 oz can black beans or about 3 cups cooked

Â½ to Â¾ tsp cayenne ( or use habanero)
Â¼ to Â½ tsp black pepper
a good dash of cinnamon (nutmeg and all spice.)
Â¼ tsp sugar or other sweetener
1.5 cups of corn kernels or 2 ears of corn

itemListElement.text: Drain the black beans, wash, drain and set aside. Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat.. Add onions and cook until translucent. 4 to 5 mins.
itemListElement.name: Drain the black beans, wash, drain and set aside. Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat.. Add onions and cook until translucent. 4 to 5 mins.

itemListElement.text: Add the beans, spices, herbs and water and mix well. At this point, you can add in some chopped veggies. Partially cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Stir occasionally. Taste and adjust salt and heat.
itemListElement.name: Add the beans, spices, herbs and water and mix well. At this point, you can add in some chopped veggies. Partially cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Stir occasionally. Taste and adjust salt and heat.

itemListElement.text: Grill the ears of corn over a grill or gas flame until grilled to preference. Cut the kernels off the cob and use. Or Add frozen corn kernels to a heavy bottom skillet over high heat. Cook until most of the kernels have browned. Stir occasionally. 6 to 8 minutes

itemListElement.text: Add the cooled corn to a bowl with the onions and cilantro. Add salt, pepper, cayenne and a dash of lime to taste. Add chopped tomatoes for variation.

itemListElement.text: Heat the tortillas over direct flame to crisp some of the edges. Add a good helping of the black beans, roasted corn salsa, some avocado and a dash of lime. Serve!
